jsymbolic2.commandline

Class CommandLineFeatureExtraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsymbolic2.commandline.CommandLineFeatureExtraction

  • public final class CommandLineFeatureExtraction
extends java.lang.Object
    A general class that deals with the feature extraction process to be used from the command line.

    • Method Detail

      • extractFeaturesFromAllFiles

        public static void extractFeaturesFromAllFiles(java.util.List<java.io.File> fileList,
                                               MIDIFeatureProcessor processor,
                                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> errorLog)
        Extracts all files from the input directory and processes the features from each of those files. Eventually saves to an ACE XML file for analysis.
        Parameters:
        fileList - List of all files that need to be feature extracted.
        processor - The Feature Processor to extract features with.
        errorLog - List of strings of all errors to be printed.

      • setupFeatureProcessorAndExtractFeatures

        public static void setupFeatureProcessorAndExtractFeatures(java.lang.String input_file_path,
                                                           java.lang.String feature_values_save_path,
                                                           java.lang.String feature_descriptions_save_path,
                                                           boolean save_features_for_each_window,
                                                           boolean save_overall_recording_features,
                                                           double window_size,
                                                           double window_overlap)
        Set up the feature processor with the appropriate variables and then extract features accordingly.
        Parameters:
        input_file_path - file path given by user
        feature_values_save_path - feature value save path given by user
        feature_descriptions_save_path - feature description save path given by user
        save_features_for_each_window - given by user for window
        save_overall_recording_features - opposite of SAVE_FEATURES_FOR_EACH_WINDOW
        window_size - size of window given by user or else assumed to be 1.0
        window_overlap - overlap offset given by user or else assumed to be 0

      • setupFeatureProcessorFromConfig

        public static void setupFeatureProcessorFromConfig(ConfigurationFileData configFileData,
                                                   java.util.List<java.io.File> inputFileList,
                                                   java.lang.String featureValueSavePath,
                                                   java.lang.String featureDefinitionSavePath)
        Extracts the files from all the input files given the specified configuration file data.
        Parameters:
        configFileData - Configuration file data to be used.
        inputFileList - List of all files that need to be feature extracted.
        featureValueSavePath - The path of the feature value output file.
        featureDefinitionSavePath - The path of the feature definition output file.
